The 32 programmes in Table II-1 were identified from a literature search for information on 
programme activities or components. Regardless of platform, all programmes reviewed were 
multi-component. Of the 32 programmes, 60% or more implemented supplementary feeding 
(usually targeted), growth monitoring and counselling (support for breastfeeding, complementary 
feeding or pregnancy, alone or in combination) (see Table II-4a ); 80% or more of the 21
